input.sentences: the ruins were very old and carried so much history
[male] went into one of the old temples
[male] posed by some other old artifacts
beautiful ruins john loved his visit
output.sentences: This male is my boyfriend and he sent me this picture of some ruins he visited, recently.
He is studying archeology and history and carried many books with him to interpret the ruins that he saw.
Some of the temples he saw had very feminine characteristics, while others seemed very male in spirit.
My favorite male sent this photo of him, standing in a posed and manly stance beside  these ancient artifacts.
He didn't have to tell me how much he loved his visit to the ruins.
